description.zh-cn: 中国物理化学家，中国科学院院士，第三世界科学院院士，曾任中国科学技术大学第七任校长和南方科技大学首任校长。他是明太祖朱元璋第十一子蜀王朱椿的后裔。
description.en: A Chinese physical chemist, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and The World Academy of Sciences. He served as the seventh president of the University of Science and Technology of China and the first president of the Southern University of Science and Technology. He is a descendant of Zhu Chun, the 11th son of Zhu Yuanzhang, the Hongwu Emperor of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国四川省的省会。
description.en: The capital of Sichuan province, China.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋第十一子，封为蜀王。
description.en: The 11th son of Zhu Yuanzhang, the Hongwu Emperor, enfeoffed as the Prince of Shu.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时之父。
description.en: Father of Zhu Qingshi.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的一所研究型大学。
description.en: A research university in Hefei, Anhui, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家最高学术机构、科学技术最高咨询机构、自然科学与高技术综合研究发展中心。
description.en: The national academy for the natural sciences of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一个独立的国际科学组织，旨在支持和促进发展中国家的科学研究。
description.en: An independent international science organization that aims to support and promote scientific research in developing countries.

en: Southern University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省深圳市的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Shenzhen, Guangdong, China.

nodes.id: 中国科学院选键化学重点实验室

zh-cn: 中国科学院选键化学重点实验室

description.zh-cn: 由朱清时在中国科学技术大学创建的重点实验室。
description.en: A key laboratory founded by Zhu Qingshi at the University of Science and Technology of China.

nodes.id: 生物质洁净能源实验室

zh-cn: 生物质洁净能源实验室

description.zh-cn: 由朱清时在中国科学技术大学创建的实验室，旨在倡导“绿色化学研究”。
description.en: A laboratory founded by Zhu Qingshi at the University of Science and Technology of China to advocate for 'green chemistry research'.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的一所私立大学。
description.en: A private university in Tokyo, Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，科学家。曾接替朱清时担任中国科学技术大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and scientist. He succeeded Zhu Qingshi as the president of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个专业学会，旨在推动化学科学的发展。
description.en: A professional society in the United Kingdom with the goal of advancing the chemical sciences.

nodes.id: 中国化学会 (中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 中国化学会 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国化学工作者的学术性群众团体。
description.en: An academic mass organization for chemists in the People's Republic of China.

en: Chinese Society for the History of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术史工作者的群众性学术团体。
description.en: A mass academic organization for workers in the history of science and technology in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，朱清时的前任中国科学技术大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese physicist, Zhu Qingshi's predecessor as president of the University of Science and Technology of China.

nodes.id: 中国科学技术大学研究生院

zh-cn: 中国科学技术大学研究生院

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术大学负责研究生教育的机构。
description.en: The institution responsible for graduate education at the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理化学家和纳米科技专家，曾任中国科学院院长。
description.en: A Chinese physical chemist and nanoscientist, former President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在朱清时卸任后代理南方科技大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the acting president of the Southern University of Science and Technology after Zhu Qingshi's departure.

description.zh-cn: 关于中国为何长期未能培养出杰出人才的著名问题。
description.en: A famous question regarding why China has not produced outstanding talents for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 一家中文文化、历史、科普网站，以其对学术不端行为的揭露而闻名。
description.en: A Chinese-language website on culture, history, and popular science, known for its exposure of academic misconduct.

description.zh-cn: 一种古老的宗教和哲学体系，起源于印度。
description.en: An ancient religion and philosophical system that originated in India.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时出生于中华民国四川省成都市。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi was born in Chengdu, Sichuan, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时是明太祖朱元璋的后裔。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi is a descendant of Zhu Yuanzhang, the Hongwu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时是明太祖第十一子蜀王朱椿的第二十世子孙。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi is the 20th-generation descendant of Zhu Chun, the Prince of Shu, who was the 11th son of the Hongwu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱椿是明太祖朱元璋的第十一子。
description.en: Zhu Chun was the 11th son of Zhu Yuanzhang, the Hongwu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时是朱穆雍的第三子。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi is the third son of Zhu Muyong.

description.zh-cn: 1968年毕业于中国科学技术大学近代物理系。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Modern Physics at the University of Science and Technology of China in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1991年当选为中国科学院院士。
description.en: Elected as an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时是第三世界科学院院士。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi is a fellow of The World Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时于1998年至2008年担任中国科学技术大学第七任校长。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi served as the seventh president of the University of Science and Technology of China from 1998 to 2008.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时于2009年至2014年担任南方科技大学首任校长。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi served as the first president of the Southern University of Science and Technology from 2009 to 2014.

relationships.target: 中国科学院选键化学重点实验室

description.zh-cn: 1990年代中期，朱清时在中国科学技术大学创建了中国科学院选键化学重点实验室。
description.en: In the mid-1990s, Zhu Qingshi founded the Key Laboratory of Bond Selective Chemistry of the Chinese Academy of Sciences at the University of Science and Technology of China.

relationships.target: 生物质洁净能源实验室

description.zh-cn: 朱清时在中国科学技术大学创建了“生物质洁净能源实验室”，以倡导“绿色化学研究”。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi founded the 'Biomass Clean Energy Laboratory' at the University of Science and Technology of China to advocate for 'green chemistry research'.

description.zh-cn: 日本创价大学授予朱清时名誉博士学位。
description.en: Soka University in Japan awarded Zhu Qingshi an honorary doctorate degree.

description.zh-cn: 侯建国接替朱清时担任中国科学技术大学校长职务。
description.en: Hou Jianguo succeeded Zhu Qingshi as the president of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时接替汤洪高担任中国科学技术大学校长职务。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi succeeded Tang Honggao as the president of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 李铭在朱清时退休后代理南方科技大学校长职务。
description.en: Li Ming served as the acting president of the Southern University of Science and Technology after Zhu Qingshi's retirement.

relationships.target: 中国科学技术大学研究生院

description.zh-cn: 朱清时曾于2000年6月至2001年4月担任中国科学技术大学研究生院院长。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi served as the Dean of the Graduate School of the University of Science and Technology of China from June 2000 to April 2001.

description.zh-cn: 白春礼接替朱清时担任中国科学技术大学研究生院院长。
description.en: Bai Chunli succeeded Zhu Qingshi as the Dean of the Graduate School of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时是英国皇家化学学会会士。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi is a Fellow of the Royal Society of Chemistry.

relationships.target: 中国化学会 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 朱清时担任中国化学会常务理事。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi serves as an Executive Council Member of the Chinese Chemical Society.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时担任中国科学技术史学会副理事长。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi serves as the Vice President of the Council of the Chinese Society for the History of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时是第八届、第九届全国人大代表。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi was a deputy to the 8th and 9th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 朱清时是第十届全国政协委员。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi was a member of the 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时在担任南方科技大学校长期间，其理想是建立一所能够回答“钱学森之问”的大学。
description.en: During his tenure as the president of Southern University of Science and Technology, Zhu Qingshi's ideal was to build a university that could answer 'Qian Xuesen's question'.

description.zh-cn: 新语丝网站曾专门开设“朱清时迷信事件”专栏，批评其宣传佛教等观点。
description.en: The website New Threads created a special section titled 'Zhu Qingshi's Superstition Incident' to criticize his promotion of Buddhism and other views.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时发表《物理学步入禅境：缘起性空》的演讲，宣传其对佛教的理解，认为当代物理学理论与佛教观点相符。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi delivered a speech titled 'Physics Entering the Realm of Zen: Pratītyasamutpāda and Śūnyatā', promoting his understanding of Buddhism and arguing that contemporary physics theories align with Buddhist views.
